document_data.caption: An [[elf]] fires a screaming [[bow]].
document_data.name: Screaming
document_data.mainbody: '''''Screaming''''' was a [[weapon quality|quality]] that could be applied to magical weapons.
document_data.Description: When active, the weapon made a low and irritating humming noise. It changed to a painful screaming when it struck a target.
document_data.Powers:
It inflicted [[sonic]] damage, even within the area of a ''[[silence]]'' spell. It had no special effect on creatures with enhanced hearing, but it was especially annoying to them.

If it was applied to ranged weapons, the effects applied to their ammunition.
document_data.Creation: It required a ''[[shout]]'' or ''[[sound burst]]'' spell to enchant a ''screaming'' weapon.
